articles.title: American voters overwhelmingly like the stuff the GOP wants to strip out of Biden's infrastructure plan - Business Insider
articles.description: A CNBC survey found that just 36% of voters like Biden's infrastructure plan as it is. But they largely support measures that GOP lawmakers oppose.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden unveiled his $2.3 trillion infrastructure package two weeks ago, and a CNBC survey found overwhelming support for it, but only parts of it. That's where it gets interesting.
